ISO/IEC/IEEE 12207:2017(E) 2) Identify the knowledge, skills, and knowledge assets to be managed. 3) Identify projects that can benefit from the application of the knowledge, skills, and knowledge assets. b) Share knowledge and skills throughout the organization. This activity consists of the following tasks: 1) Establish and maintain a classification for capturing and sharing knowledge and skills across the organization. NOTE This classification can include expert, common, and domain knowledge and skills, as well as lessons learned
